com.fiternity.service

Interface FiternityService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FiternityServiceImpl

    public interface FiternityService
    FiternityService is a collection of methods that can be accessed for manipulating Fiternity app's database.So other portlets can access all of methods written in this interface. Methods in this class are all implemented in FiternityServiceImpl class. Studios, Rewards, Challenges, Events and Notification portlets are some example which is dependent on this class. Each portlets have their own listing,add,edit and get details method.All of it's logic are implemented here. All of this methods actions are determined.So while executing, it has some restrictions on parameters. Attempting to add or edit an ineligible object (Studio,Reward,etc.,) throws an unchecked exception, typically SQLGrammerException or NumberFormatException. Attempting to query the presence of an ineligible data may throw an exception, or it may simply return false, or an empty value.
    See Also:
    FiternityServiceImpl

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addAdvert(java.lang.String advert)
      Returns client response that holds adverts (promos and upsells) insertion.
      java.lang.String addChallenge(java.lang.String challenge)
      Returns client response that holds status of activity insertion.
      java.lang.String addReward(java.lang.String reward)
      Returns client response that holds status of reward insertion.
      java.lang.String addRewardVoucher(java.lang.String rewardVoucher)
      Returns client response that holds status of voucher insertion.
      java.lang.String addStudio(java.lang.String studio)
      Returns client response that holds status of studio insertion.
      java.lang.String addVoucher(java.lang.String voucher)
      Returns client response that holds status of voucher insertion.
      java.lang.String editAdvert(java.lang.String advert)
      Returns client response that holds status of adverts (promos and upsells) updation.
      java.lang.String editChallenge(java.lang.String challenge)
      Returns challenge response that holds status of studio's activity updation.
      java.lang.String editCustomerStatus(java.lang.String party)
      Returns client response that holds status of party updation.
      java.lang.String editReward(java.lang.String reward)
      Returns client response that holds status of reward updation.
      java.lang.String editStudio(java.lang.String studio)
      Returns client response that holds status of studio updation.
      java.lang.String getActivityDetails(java.lang.String actId)
      Returns client response that holds details of activity(challenges/events) based on passed activity id.
      java.lang.String getActivityListing(java.lang.String stdId, java.lang.String activityType, java.lang.String activityStatus, java.lang.String searchQuery)
      It will get all the Activities(challenges,events) by calling web services based on given parameter studio id, activity type(challenges or events), activityStatus (current Activity or expired Activity) and search query.
      java.lang.String getAdvertDetails(java.lang.String ofrId)
      Returns client response that holds details of adverts based on passed adverts id.
      java.lang.String getAdvertsListing(java.lang.String searchQuery)
      It will get all the adverts(promos and upsells) by calling web services.
      java.lang.String getBeaconDetails(java.lang.String beaId, java.lang.String stdId)
      Returns client response that holds details of beacons based on passed beacon id.
      java.lang.String getBeaconsListing(java.lang.String searchQuery)
      It will get all the beacons by calling web services.
      java.lang.String getCustomerDetails(java.lang.String ptyId)
      Returns client response that holds details of customer based on passed party id.
      java.lang.String getCustomersListing(java.lang.String searchQuery)
      It will get all the parties by calling web services.
      java.lang.String getInterestedParticipants(java.lang.String stdId, java.lang.String searchQuery)
      Returns client response that has list of participants who are interested in specific activity(challenges/events) based on passed activity id.
      java.lang.String getNotificationDetails(java.lang.String type)
      Returns client response that holds details of content based on passed notification type.
      java.lang.String getNotificationsListing()
      It will get all the app's notification content by calling web services.
      java.lang.String getRewardDetails(java.lang.String rewardId)
      Returns client response that holds details of reward based on passed reward id.
      java.lang.String getRewardsListing(java.lang.String stdId, java.lang.String rewardType, java.lang.String searchQuery)
      It will get all the rewards by calling web services based on given parameter studio id, reward type and search query.
      java.lang.String getStudioDetails(java.lang.String stdId)
      Returns client response that holds details of studio based on passed studio id.
      java.lang.String getStudiosListing()
      It will get all the studios from database.
      java.lang.String saveBeacon(java.lang.String beacon)
      Returns client response that holds beacons details for beacon insertion and updation.
      java.lang.String saveNotification(java.lang.String notify)
      Returns client response that holds notification content details for content updation.
      java.lang.String selectWinner(java.lang.String winner)
      This function used for selecting winners from list of participants who are all finished their challenge.
      java.lang.String studioSearch(java.lang.String searchString)
      It will search all the studios from given studio list by calling web services where it meets search criteria.

        stdId - A studio Id for listing activities of it own.
        activityType - A string the holds types of Activity (challenges or events).
        activityStatus - A string the holds current status of Activity (current Activity or expired Activity).
        searchQuery - A string that has to be searched in the database.
        Returns:
        String a response of web service.
        Throws:
        com.fiternity.UnknownException - throws runtime exception.

        Returns client response that holds notification content details for content updation.
        Parameters:
        notify - It contains all the details of notification. So it can be added into database.
        Returns:
        String a response of web service call.
        Throws:
        com.fiternity.SQLGrammerException - throws when SQL syntax generated for you is incorrect.
        com.fiternity.NumberFormatException - throws when we convert from string to numeric value.
        com.fiternity.NullException - throws when null value is assigned to an object reference.
        com.fiternity.UnknownException - throws runtime exception.

      • getNotificationsListing

        java.lang.String getNotificationsListing()
                                         throws com.fiternity.UnknownException
        It will get all the app's notification content by calling web services.
        Returns:
        String a response of web service.
        Throws:
        com.fiternity.UnknownException - throws runtime exception.
